CompanyDescription: Trustmark Corporation (Trustmark), a Mississippi business corporation incorporated in 1968, is a bank holding company headquartered in Jackson, Mississippi. Trustmark's principal subsidiary is Trustmark National Bank (TNB), initially chartered by the State of Mississippi in 1889. At December 31, 2019, TNB had total assets of $13.496 billion, which represented approximately 99.99% of the consolidated assets of Trustmark.  ... More ...
